scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d postgres && sleep 5 && npm run db:migrate
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U aisandbox -d aisandbox -f /schema/schema.sql
scripts.clean: docker-compose down -v && rm -rf node_modules services/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules frontend/node_modules
